desc: Mavena Designs specializes in custom painted furniture and finishes, offering both services and products. Our retail store sells Wise Owl Paint, One Hour Enamel, Jolie Home paint, Dixie Belle Paint, Silk Libe, Cling On brushes, Scrubby soap, and Transfers and stencils for all you painted furniture project and needs.

layout.text: Custom Furniture Restoration, Paints, and Finishes
Re-invent your furniture one brush-stroke at a time!
